S06sspp2_1u:52_12_1: dhyānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:52_13_0: na cānyā dhyānāsattānyā dhyānaśūnyatānyā dhyānaviviktatānyā dhyānāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:52_13_1: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dhyānāsattā

S06sspp2_1u:52_13_3: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:54_13_2: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cārūpyasamāpattyasattā yā cārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā

S06sspp2_1u:73_13_3: yā ca sarvajñāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca
S06sspp2_1u:74_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:75_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:75_5: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra na rūpasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate rūpaśūnyatām upādāya.
S06sspp2_1u:75_6: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:75_7: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:76_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti.

S06sspp2_1u:150_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:150_6: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:151_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:151_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:157_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇenāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:157_2: [ŚsP_II-1_65] tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:157_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:157_5: nāparānta upalabhyate, na madhyam upalabhyate, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:157_6: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:158_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇenāryasatyāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:158_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:158_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāryasatyānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:158_5: āryasatyaśūnyatām upādāya, na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:159_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate dhyānaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:159_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:159_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa dhyānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.

S06sspp2_1u:161_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākaśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:164_4_1: na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhaśūnyatām
S06sspp2_1u:164_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:165_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhijñāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:166_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samādhīnāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate samādhiśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:166_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:166_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa samādhyaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:167_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena dhāraṇīmukhāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:167_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:167_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:167_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:167_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa dhāraṇīmukhāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:168_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena tathāgatabalāparyantatayā [ŚsP_II-1_68] bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:168_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:168_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tathāgatabalānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate tathāgatabalaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:168_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:168_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa tathāgatabalāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:169_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena vaiśāradyāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:169_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:169_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vaiśāradyānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate vaiśāradyaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:169_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:169_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vaiśāradyāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:170_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena pratisaṃvidaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:170_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:170_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratisaṃvidāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate pratisaṃvidśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:170_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:170_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pratisaṃvidaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:171_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇena mahākaruṇāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:171_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:171_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra mahākaruṇānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate mahākaruṇāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:171_5: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:171_6: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa [ŚsP_II-1_69] mahākaruṇāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:172_0: yat punar evaṃ vadasi, kena kāraṇenāveṇikabuddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti,
S06sspp2_1u:172_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:172_4: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāveṇikabuddhadharmānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:172_6: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:173_0: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:173_1: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:173_2: kena kāraṇena vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:173_3: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:173_4: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:173_5: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti.
S06sspp2_1u:173_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:173_8: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:173_9: vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:173_10: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:173_11: saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃjñā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:173_12: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:173_13: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:173_14: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:173_15: vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:527_0: evam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhamāneṣu bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:528_0: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:529_1: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:529_2: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:530_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:530_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:530_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:530_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:531_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
S06sspp2_1u:531_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:531_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:531_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:532_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:532_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:532_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:532_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:533_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:533_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:533_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:533_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:534_0_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:534_0_1: iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa [ŚsP_II-1_92] iti kāyasaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:534_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:534_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:534_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:535_0_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
S06sspp2_1u:535_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:535_2_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:535_2_1: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:535_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:536_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur iti vijñānadhātur iti,
S06sspp2_1u:536_1: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:536_2: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:536_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:537_0_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
S06sspp2_1u:537_0_1: iti vijñānam iti nāmarūpam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti sparśam iti vedaneti tṛṣṇety upādānam
S06sspp2_1u:537_0_2: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:537_1: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:537_2_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:537_2_1: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo
S06sspp2_1u:537_2_2: na sā jātir na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_1u:537_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ na nāma svabhāvena [ŚsP_II-1_93] yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:538_0: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:538_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:538_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:539_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā na ca nāmni śīlapāramitā na ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:539_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śīlapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:539_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:540_0: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta kṣāntipāramitā na ca nāmni kṣāntipāramitā na ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:540_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca kṣāntipāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:540_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:541_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:541_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:541_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:542_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta dhyānapāramitā na ca nāmni dhyānapāramitā na ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:542_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dhyānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:543_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma.
S06sspp2_1u:543_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:543_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:544_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:544_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:544_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:545_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta bahirdhāśūnyatā na ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_94] nāma na ca nāmni bahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:545_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:545_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:546_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:546_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:546_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:547_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śūnyatāśūnyatā na ca śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni śūnyatāśūnyatā.

S06sspp2_1u:547_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:548_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta mahāśūnyatā na ca mahāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāśūnyatā.

S06sspp2_1u:548_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:549_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta paramārthaśūnyatā na ca paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni paramārthaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:549_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:549_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:550_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta saṃskṛtaśūnyatā na ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni saṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:550_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:550_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:551_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā na cāsaṃskṛtasunyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:551_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cāsaṃskṛtaśunyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:551_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:552_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utātyantaśūnyatā na cātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny atyantaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:552_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cātyantaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:552_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:553_0: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utānavarāgraśūnyatā na cānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavarāgraśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:553_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā [ŚsP_II-1_95] hi yac ca nāma yā cānavarāgraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:553_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:554_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utānavakāraśūnyatā na cānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavakāraśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:554_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānavakāraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:554_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:555_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prakṛtiśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:555_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:555_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:556_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta sarvadharmaśūnyatā na ca sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvadharmaśūnyatā.

S06sspp2_1u:557_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:557_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:557_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:558_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utānupalambhaśūnyatā na cānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anupalambhaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:558_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānupalambhaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:558_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:559_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvaśūnyatā na cābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:559_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:559_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:560_0: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatā na ca svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:560_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:560_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:561_0: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cabhavasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_1u:561_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na [ŚsP_II-1_96] saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:561_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:562_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:563_0: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta smṛtyupasthānānīti na ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni smṛtyupasthānāni.
S06sspp2_1u:563_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca smṛtyupasthānāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:563_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:564_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta samyakprahāṇānīti na ca samyakprahāneṣu nāma na ca nāmni samyakprahāṇāni.
S06sspp2_1u:564_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca samyakprahāṇāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:565_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma ye carddhipādā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:565_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.

S06sspp2_1u:566_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni cendriyāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:566_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.

S06sspp2_1u:567_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni ca balāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:567_2: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.

S06sspp2_1u:569_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ [ŚsP_II-1_97] yad utāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti na cāryāṣṭāṅge marge nāma na ca nāmny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:569_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārga ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

S06sspp2_1u:572_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca nāma yāni cāpramāṇāny ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:572_2: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:573_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utārūpyasamāpattaya iti na cārūpyasamāpattiṣu nāma na ca nāmny ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.

S06sspp2_1u:842_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,

S06sspp2_1u:849_9: yānabhisaṃskṛtā na sā jātiḥ, yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na taj jarāmaraṇam.
S06sspp2_1u:853_2: ye 'nabhisaṃskṛtā na te ṛddhipādāḥ yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:853_17: yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni catvāri [ŚsP_II-1_157] vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:853_18: yā anabhisaṃskṛtā na tāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:854_1: kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi, tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06sspp2_1u:855_0_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_1u:855_0_1: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam
S06sspp2_1u:856_1: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06sspp2_1u:857_1: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti.
S06sspp2_1u:857_2: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:857_3: iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:858_1: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:869_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
S06sspp2_1u:870_0: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:870_1_0: sacet bodhisatto mahāsattva evam uddiśyamānenotrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
S06sspp2_1u:870_1_1: āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:870_1_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [ŚsP_II-1_164] nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:871_0: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06sspp2_1u:872_1: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,

S06sspp2_1u:881_2: tasmin samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati ṛddhipādā imā iti,

S06sspp2_1u:881_4: tasmin samaye balāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati balānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_5: tasmin samaye bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati bodhyaṅgānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_6: tasmin samaye āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryāṣṭaṅgo mārga iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_7: tasmin samaye āryasatyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryasatyāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_8: tasmin samaye dhyānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhyānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_9: tasmin samaye 'pramāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_10: tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_11: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭau vimokṣān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty aṣṭau vimokṣā [ŚsP_II-1_168] ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_12: tasmin samaye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_13: tasmin samaye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_14: tasmin samaye 'bhijñā nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty abhijñā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_15: tasmin samaye samādhīn nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhaya ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_16: tasmin samaye dhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhāraṇīmukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_17: tasmin samaye daśatathāgatabalāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśatathāgatabalānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_18: tasmin samaye catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catvāri vaiśāradyānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_19: tasmin samaye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catasraḥ pratisaṃvida imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_20: tasmin samaye mahāmaitrīṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāmaitrīyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_21: tasmin samaye mahākaruṇāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahākaruṇeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:881_22: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āveṇikā buddhadharmā eta iti.
S06sspp2_1u:882_0_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06sspp2_1u:882_0_1: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvasamadhidhāraṇīmukhāṇy
S06sspp2_1u:883_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:889_1: abdhātuṃ na samanupasyati, tejodhātuṃ na samanupasyati, vāyudhātuṃ na samanupasyati, ākāśadhātuṃ na samanupasyati,
S06sspp2_1u:890_0: avidyāṃ na samanupasyati, saṃskārān na samanupasyati, vijñānaṃ na samanupasyati, nāmarūpaṃ na samanupasyati, ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:890_1_0: sparśaṃ na samanupasyati, vedanāṃ na samanupasyati, tṛṣṇāṃ na samanupasyati, upādānaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:890_1_1: na samanupasyati, bhavaṃ na samanupasyati, jātiṃ na samanupasyati, jarāmaraṇaṃ na
S06sspp2_1u:893_2: ṛddhipādān na samanupasyati, indriyāṇi na samanupasyati, balāni [ŚsP_II-1_170] na samanupasyati,
S06sspp2_1u:893_6: dhyānāni na samanupasyati, apramāṇāni na samanupasyati, ārūpyasamāpattīr na samanupasyati,
S06sspp2_1u:893_10: abhijñā na samanupasyati, samādhīn na samanupasyati, dhāraṇīmukhāni na samanupasyati,
S06sspp2_1u:895_0: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:895_1: iti hi rūpaṃ >; cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:895_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:895_3: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:896_0: tathā hi bhagavan yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:896_1: iti hi vedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:896_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:896_3: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:897_0: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:897_1: iti hi saṃjñā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:897_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:897_3: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:898_0: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārā,
S06sspp2_1u:898_1: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:898_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:898_3: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:899_0: tathā hi bhagavan yo vijñānasyānutpādo na te vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:899_1: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:899_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:899_3: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ.
S06sspp2_1u:900_0: tathā hi yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:900_1: iti hi cakṣuś [ŚsP_II-1_171] cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:900_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:900_3: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:901_0: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:901_1: iti hi śrotraṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:901_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:901_3: tasmād yah śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:902_0: tathā hi bhagavan ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:902_1: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:902_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:902_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:903_0: tathā hi bhagavan jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:903_1: iti hi jihvā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:903_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:903_3: tasmād yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:904_0: tathā hi yo bhagavan kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:904_1: iti hi kāyaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:904_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:904_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:905_0: tathā hi yo bhagavan manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:905_1: iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:905_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:905_3: tasmād yo manaso nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:906_0: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:906_1: iti hi rūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:906_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:906_3: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:907_0: yo bhagavan śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:907_1: iti hi śabdaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:907_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:907_3: tasmād yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:908_0: yo bhagavan gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:908_1: iti hi gandhaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:908_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:908_3: tasmād yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:909_1: yo bhagavan rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:909_2: iti hi rasaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:909_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:909_4: tasmād yo rasasyānutpādo na so rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:910_0: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśa,
S06sspp2_1u:910_1: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:910_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:910_3: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:911_0: yo bhagavan dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:911_1: iti hi dharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:911_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:911_3: tasmād yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:912_0: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:912_1: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:912_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:912_3: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:913_0: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:913_1: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:914_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:914_1: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:914_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:915_0: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:915_1: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:915_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:915_3: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:916_0: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:916_1: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:916_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:916_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:917_0: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:917_1: iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:917_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:917_3: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_173] yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:918_0: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:919_0: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:923_0: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:923_1: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:923_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:923_3: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:924_0: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:924_1: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:924_3: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:925_0: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,

S06sspp2_1u:926_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,

S06sspp2_1u:934_0: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:934_1: iti hy ākāśadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:935_0: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:966_1: [ŚsP_II-1_179] iti hi sarvadharmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:966_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:966_3: tasmād yaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:967_0: yo bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:967_1: iti hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:967_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:967_3: tasmād yaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:968_0: yo bhagavan anupalambhaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:968_1: iti hy anupalambhaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:968_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:969_0: yo bhagavan abhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:969_1: iti hy abhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:969_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:970_0: yo bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:970_1: iti hi svabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:970_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:970_3: tasmād yaḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:971_0: yo bhagavan abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:971_1: iti hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:971_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:972_0: yo bhagavan smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānānīti hi smṛtyupasthānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:972_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:972_2: tasmād yaḥ smṛtyupasthānānām anutpādo na tāni smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_1u:973_0: yo bhagavan samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇānīti hi samyakprahāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:973_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:973_2: tasmād yaḥ samyakprahāṇānām anutpādo na tāni samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_1u:974_1: yo bhagavann ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na te ṛddhipādā iti hy ṛddhipādāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:974_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:974_3: tasmād y a ṛddhipādānām anutpādo na ta ṛddhipādāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:975_0: yo bhagavann indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇīti hīndriyāṇi cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:975_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:975_2: tasmād ya indriyāṇām anutpādo na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:976_0: yo bhagavan balānām anutpādo na tāni balānīti hi balāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:976_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:976_2: tasmād yo balānām anutpādo na tāni balāni,
S06sspp2_1u:977_0: yo bhagavan bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgānīti hi bodhyaṅgāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:977_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:977_2: tasmād yo bodhyaṅgānām anutpādo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_1u:978_0: yo bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga iti hy āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:978_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:978_2: tasmād ya āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasyānutpādo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:979_0: yo bhagavann āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyānīti hi āryasatyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:979_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:979_2: tasmād y a āryasatyānām anutpādo na tāny āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:980_0: yo bhagavan dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānānīti hi dhyānāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:980_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:980_2: tasmād yo dhyānānām anutpādo na tāni dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_1u:981_0: yo bhagavann apramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇānīti hy apramāṇāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:981_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:981_2: tasmād yo 'pramāṇānām anutpādo na tāny apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_1u:982_0: yo bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattaya iti hy ārūpyasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:982_1: [ŚsP_II-1_181] tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:982_2: tasmād ya ārūpyasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:983_0: yo bhagavan vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣā iti hi vimokṣāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:983_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:983_2: tasmād yo vimokṣāṇām anutpādo na te vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:984_0: yo bhagavann anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattaya iti hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:984_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:984_2: tasmād yo nupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām anutpādo na tā anupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:985_0_0: yo bhagavann śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānīti
S06sspp2_1u:985_0_1: hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:985_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:985_2: tasmād yaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānām anutpādo na tāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_1u:986_0: yo bhagavann abhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñā iti hy abhijñāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:986_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:986_2: tasmād yo 'bhijñānām anutpādo na tā abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:987_0: yo bhagavan samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhaya iti hy samādhayaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:987_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:987_2: tasmād yaḥ samādhīnām anutpādo na te samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:988_0: yo bhagavann dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāni dhāraṇīmukhānīti hy dhāraṇīmukhāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:988_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:988_2: tasmād yo dhāraṇīmukhānām anutpādo na tāny dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_1u:989_0: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:989_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:989_2: tasmād yo daśatathāgatabalānām anutpādo na tāni daśatathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_1u:990_1: yo bhagavan vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyānīti hi vaiśāradyāni cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:990_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:990_3: tasmād yo vaiśāradyānām anutpādo na tāni vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:991_0: yo bhagavan pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvida iti hi pratisaṃvidaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:991_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:991_2: tasmād yaḥ pratisaṃvidām anutpādo na tāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:992_0: yo bhagavan mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sa mahāmaitrī iti hi mahāmaitrī cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:992_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:992_2: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā anutpādo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_1u:993_0: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:993_1: iti hi mahākaruṇā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:993_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:993_3: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā anutpādo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:994_0: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmānām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmā iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:994_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:994_2: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:995_0: yo bhagavan tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:995_1: iti hi tathatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:995_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:995_3: tasmād yaḥ tathatāyā anutpādo na sa tathatā,
S06sspp2_1u:996_0: yo bhagavan dharmatāyā anutpādo na tā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:996_1: iti hi dharmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:996_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:996_3: tasmād yo dharmatāyā anutpādo na sā dharmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:997_0: yo bhagavan dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:997_1: iti hi dharmadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:997_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:997_3: tasmād yo dharmadhātor anutpādo na sa dharmadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:998_0: yo bhagavan dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na sa dharmaniyāmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:998_1: iti hi [ŚsP_II-1_183] dharmaniyāmatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:998_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:998_3: tasmād yo dharmaniyāmatāyā anutpādo na ta dharmaniyāmatā,
S06sspp2_1u:999_0: yo bhagavan bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭir iti hi bhūtakoṭiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:999_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:999_2: tasmād yo bhūtakoṭer anutpādo na sā bhūtakoṭiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1000_0: yo bhagavann acintyadhātor anutpādo na so 'cintyahātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1000_1: iti hy acintyadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1000_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1001_0: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:1001_1: iti hi sarvajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1001_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1001_3: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:1002_0: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:1002_1: iti hi mārgākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1002_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1002_3: tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:1003_0: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:1003_1: iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1003_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1003_3: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_1u:1004_0: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:1004_1: iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1004_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1004_3: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1005_0: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1005_1: iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1005_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1005_3: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1006_0: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:1006_1: iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1006_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na [ŚsP_II-1_184] vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1006_3: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:1007_0: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1007_1: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1007_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1007_3: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1008_0: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1008_1: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1008_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1008_3: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:1009_0: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1009_1: iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1009_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1009_3: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1010_0: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:1010_1: iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1010_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1010_3: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1011_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:1011_1: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1011_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1011_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1012_0: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:1012_1: iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1012_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1012_3: tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:1013_0: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1013_1: iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1013_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1013_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1014_0: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1014_1: iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1014_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1014_3: tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1015_1: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1015_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1015_3: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1016_0: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1016_1: iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1016_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1016_3: tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1017_0: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1017_1: iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1017_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1017_3: tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1018_0: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1018_1: iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1018_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1018_3: tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1019_0: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1019_1: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1019_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1019_3: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1020_0: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1020_1: iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1020_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1020_3: tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1021_0: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1021_1: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1021_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1021_3: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1022_0: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1022_1: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1022_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1022_3: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1023_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1023_1: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1023_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? [ŚsP_II-1_186] tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1023_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1024_0: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1024_1: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1024_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1024_3: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1025_0: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1025_1: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1025_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1025_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1026_0: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1026_1: iti hi manovijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1026_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1026_3: tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:1027_0: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1027_1: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1027_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1027_3: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1028_0: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1028_1: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1028_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1028_3: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1029_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1029_1: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1029_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1029_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1030_0: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1030_1: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1030_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1030_3: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1031_0: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1031_1: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1031_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1031_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1032_1: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1032_2: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1032_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1032_4: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1033_0: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1033_1: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1033_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1033_3: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1034_0: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1034_1: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1034_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1034_3: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1035_0: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1035_1: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1035_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1035_3: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1036_0: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1036_1: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1036_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1036_3: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1037_0: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1037_1: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1037_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1037_3: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1038_0: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1038_1: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1038_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1038_3: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_1u:1039_1: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1039_2: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1039_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1039_4: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1040_0: yo bhagavann abdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1040_1: iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1040_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1041_0: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1041_1: iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1041_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1041_3: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1042_0: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1042_1: iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1042_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1042_3: tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1043_0: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa akāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1043_1: iti hy ākāśadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1043_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1043_3: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1044_0: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1044_1: iti hi vijñānadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1044_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1044_3: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1045_0: yo bhagavann avidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:1045_1: iti hy avidyā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1045_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1046_0: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1046_1: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1046_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1046_3: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1047_0: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1047_1: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1047_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan [ŚsP_II-1_189] na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1047_3: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1048_0: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:1048_1: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1048_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1048_3: tasmād yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1049_0: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:1049_1: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1049_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1049_3: tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1050_0: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1050_1: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1050_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1050_3: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1051_0: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1051_1: iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1051_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1051_3: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:1052_0: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:1052_1: iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:1052_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:1052_3: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:1053_0: yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam,
S06sspp2_1u:1053_1: iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:1053_3: tasmād ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:1054_0: yo bhagavan bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:1097_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? [ŚsP_II-1_195] tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,

S06sspp2_1u:1098_0: yo bhagavan daśatathāgatabalānāṃ vyayo na tāni daśatathāgatabalānīti hi daśatathāgatabalāni ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:1117_25: yad ucyate sarvākārajñatety advayasyāsaṃmoṣasya dharmasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā iti.
